RobotSpaceExplorer:DualCore.NAME: Dual Core
RobotSpaceExplorer:DualCore.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 5 cards in a single turn, gain !M! Vigor and !M! Block.

RobotSpaceExplorer:PowerGlove.NAME: Power Glove
RobotSpaceExplorer:PowerGlove.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would deal 5 or less unblocked attack damage, NL increase it by !M!.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Scanner.NAME: Scanner
RobotSpaceExplorer:Scanner.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you robotspaceexplorer:Salvage, prioritize higher rarity cards.

RobotSpaceExplorer:DroneSwarm.NAME: Drone Swarm
RobotSpaceExplorer:DroneSwarm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal 2X damage to ALL enemies and gain 2X Block.
RobotSpaceExplorer:DroneSwarm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, deal 2X damage to ALL enemies and gain 2X Block.

RobotSpaceExplorer:TrailblazerForm.NAME: Trailblazer Form
RobotSpaceExplorer:TrailblazerForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain !M! Artifact and !RobotSpaceExplorer:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.
RobotSpaceExplorer:TrailblazerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Artifact and !RobotSpaceExplorer:SecondMagic! Plated Armor.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Multitool.NAME: Multitool
RobotSpaceExplorer:Multitool.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, upgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Multitool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL cards in your hand for the rest of combat. NL

RobotSpaceExplorer:Accelerator.NAME: Accelerator
RobotSpaceExplorer:Accelerator.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play a card costing 0 each turn, draw 1 card and gain [E].

RobotSpaceExplorer:Autoloader.NAME: Autoloader
RobotSpaceExplorer:Autoloader.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Choose an attack in your hand and remove it from combat. At the start of each turn, play that card.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Autoloader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose an attack in your hand and remove it from combat. At the start of each turn, play that card.

RobotSpaceExplorer:PowerCollector.NAME: Power Collector
RobotSpaceExplorer:PowerCollector.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a power, gain 2 Strength.
RobotSpaceExplorer:PowerCollector.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a power, gain 2 Strength.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Discharger.NAME: Discharger
RobotSpaceExplorer:Discharger.DESCRIPTION: *Static *Buildup cards are now Ethereal. Status cards deal !M! damage to ALL enemies when Exhausted.

RobotSpaceExplorer:FreezeRay.NAME: Freeze Ray
RobotSpaceExplorer:FreezeRay.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Weak to an enemy, deal !M! damage to it.

RobotSpaceExplorer:StarDust.NAME: Star Dust
RobotSpaceExplorer:StarDust.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 less [E] and gain !M! robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ExhaustFan.NAME: Exhaust Fan
RobotSpaceExplorer:ExhaustFan.DESCRIPTION: Lose !RobotSpaceExplorer:SecondMagic! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Block whenever you play an attack.

RobotSpaceExplorer:MiniBoosters.NAME: MiniBoosters
RobotSpaceExplorer:MiniBoosters.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card costing 0, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies and gain !M! Block.

RobotSpaceExplorer:BlastShield.NAME: Blast Shield
RobotSpaceExplorer:BlastShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the amount an enemy intends to deal. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Wormhole.NAME: Wormhole
RobotSpaceExplorer:Wormhole.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Permanently remove it and this card from your deck.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to permanently remove

RobotSpaceExplorer:Arsenal.NAME: Arsenal
RobotSpaceExplorer:Arsenal.DESCRIPTION: Play a random attack from your Exhaust pile X times. NL Exhaust.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Arsenal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a random attack from your Exhaust pile X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Exploration.NAME: Exploration
RobotSpaceExplorer:Exploration.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, obtain a random relic. NL Remove this card from your deck.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Comet.NAME: Comet
RobotSpaceExplorer:Comet.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare, then deal damage equal to your robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare to ALL enemies.

RobotSpaceExplorer:GlueSpray.NAME: Glue Spray
RobotSpaceExplorer:GlueSpray.DESCRIPTION: Add X Glue Shots to your hand. NL Exhaust.
RobotSpaceExplorer:GlueSpray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X Upgraded Glue Shots to your hand. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ToxicBomb.NAME: Toxic Bomb
RobotSpaceExplorer:ToxicBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply !RobotSpaceExplorer:SecondMagic! Weak to ALL enemies. NL After 2 turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

RobotSpaceExplorer:FreezingShield.NAME: Freezing Shield
RobotSpaceExplorer:FreezingShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

RobotSpaceExplorer:SelfCleaning.NAME: Self-Cleaning
RobotSpaceExplorer:SelfCleaning.DESCRIPTION: Add a Slimed to your hand, then Exhaust all Status cards in your hand. Gain !M! Block and draw a card for each card Exhausted.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Electroshield.NAME: Electroshield
RobotSpaceExplorer:Electroshield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Static *Buildup to your hand.

RobotSpaceExplorer:GearShield.NAME: Gear Shield
RobotSpaceExplorer:GearShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:RigExplosive.NAME: Rig Explosive
RobotSpaceExplorer:RigExplosive.DESCRIPTION: Obtain a Fire Potion. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:DoubleFind.NAME: Double Find
RobotSpaceExplorer:DoubleFind.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 random cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:IronShell.NAME: Iron Shell
RobotSpaceExplorer:IronShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Increase this card's Block by !M! this combat.

RobotSpaceExplorer:DoubleBlock.NAME: Double Block
RobotSpaceExplorer:DoubleBlock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
RobotSpaceExplorer:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

RobotSpaceExplorer:TurboDodge.NAME: Turbo Dodge
RobotSpaceExplorer:TurboDodge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E].
RobotSpaceExplorer:TurboDodge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain [E] [E].

RobotSpaceExplorer:Fix.NAME: Fix
RobotSpaceExplorer:Fix.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact. NL Heal !RobotSpaceExplorer:SecondMagic! HP. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Reload.NAME: Reload
RobotSpaceExplorer:Reload.DESCRIPTION: Play a random Attack from your Exhaust pile.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Reload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose and play an Attack from your Exhaust pile.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Jetpack.NAME: Jetpack
RobotSpaceExplorer:Jetpack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! temporary Dexterity.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Ammunition.NAME: Ammunition
RobotSpaceExplorer:Ammunition.DESCRIPTION: Return !M! random Exhausted Attacks to your hand. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:GlueShot.NAME: Glue Shot
RobotSpaceExplorer:GlueShot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Counterblock.NAME: Counterblock
RobotSpaceExplorer:Counterblock.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card next turn.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Counterblock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards next turn.

RobotSpaceExplorer:SwiftStep.NAME: Swift Step
RobotSpaceExplorer:SwiftStep.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Block.
RobotSpaceExplorer:SwiftStep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Block. NL robotspaceexplorer:Salvage 1.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Probe.NAME: Probe
RobotSpaceExplorer:Probe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, robotspaceexplorer:Salvage !M!.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Explosion.NAME: Explosion
RobotSpaceExplorer:Explosion.DESCRIPTION: Play a random robotspaceexplorer:Missile card, then play an Aftershock for each Attack Exhausted this combat.
RobotSpaceExplorer:Explosion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play a random Upgraded robotspaceexplorer:Missile card, then play an Aftershock+ for each Attack Exhausted this combat.

RobotSpaceExplorer:HighVoltage.NAME: High Voltage
RobotSpaceExplorer:HighVoltage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add 2 *Static *Buildups to your hand.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Blaster.NAME: Blaster
RobotSpaceExplorer:Blaster.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ShockMissile.NAME: Shock Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:ShockMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ChargingLaser.NAME: Charging Laser
RobotSpaceExplorer:ChargingLaser.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

RobotSpaceExplorer:MakeshiftVolley.NAME: Makeshift Volley
RobotSpaceExplorer:MakeshiftVolley.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

RobotSpaceExplorer:BigMissile.NAME: Big Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:BigMissile.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.
RobotSpaceExplorer:BigMissile.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block and Artifact from the enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:Electropulse.NAME: Electropulse
RobotSpaceExplorer:Electropulse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a *Static *Buildup to your hand. NL Gain robotspaceexplorer:Surge !M!.

RobotSpaceExplorer:StarLightning.NAME: Star Lightning
RobotSpaceExplorer:StarLightning.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! block. NL Gain !M! robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare.

RobotSpaceExplorer:LuckyStrike.NAME: Lucky Strike
RobotSpaceExplorer:LuckyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you robotspaceexplorer:Salvage, if this is in your draw pile, play it.

RobotSpaceExplorer:SlimeMissile.NAME: Slime Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:SlimeMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Slimed to your hand. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:PlasmaMissile.NAME: Plasma Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:PlasmaMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! robotspaceexplorer:Solar_Flare. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:StunGrenade.NAME: Stun Grenade
RobotSpaceExplorer:StunGrenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ScrapToss.NAME: Scrap Toss
RobotSpaceExplorer:ScrapToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL robotspaceexplorer:Salvage !M!. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

RobotSpaceExplorer:MetalStrike.NAME: Metal Strike
RobotSpaceExplorer:MetalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL If the enemy intends to attack, do this again.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ShockKick.NAME: Shock Kick
RobotSpaceExplorer:ShockKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Add a *Static *Buildup to your hand.

RobotSpaceExplorer:StaticBuildup.NAME: Static Buildup
RobotSpaceExplorer:StaticBuildup.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, take !M! damage and gain !M! Weak.
RobotSpaceExplorer:StaticBuildup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, take !M! damage and gain !M! Weak. NL Ethereal.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ImprovisedAttack.NAME: Improvised Attack
RobotSpaceExplorer:ImprovisedAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have robotspaceexplorer:Salvaged this turn, do this !M! more times.

RobotSpaceExplorer:ScrapMissile.NAME: Scrap Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:ScrapMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL robotspaceexplorer:Salvage !M!. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:FrostMissile.NAME: Frost Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:FrostMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:LavaMissile.NAME: Lava Missile
RobotSpaceExplorer:LavaMissile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

RobotSpaceExplorer:LaserBurst.NAME: Laser Burst
RobotSpaceExplorer:LaserBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

RobotSpaceExplorer:LuckyFind.NAME: Lucky Find
RobotSpaceExplorer:LuckyFind.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, obtain a random common relic. NL Remove this card from your deck.

RobotSpaceExplorer:MiniDrones.NAME: Mini Drones
RobotSpaceExplorer:MiniDrones.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! block.
